verses.text: Ha Jehová co Diosal, yelxo val niwan yelk'ochi, smoj val yalchaj wach' lolonel t'ay t'a yol schonhab', aton tzalan b'aj tz'och ejmelal t'ay.

Manhxo jantacoc swach'il yilji jun tzalan tik, chaanh ayq'uei. Ha t'a chon tzalan Sion tik, b'aj cajan Dios, a tik ay val stzalajk'olal masanil eb' cajan t'a yol yib'anhk’inal tik. Ha Sion tik schonhab' Vinh Rey yelxo val niwan yelk'ochi.
Ha Dios ayek' t'a juntzanh palacio t'a tzalan Sion tik. Ojtacab'il to ha Dios ayoch co columaloc.
Ix smolb'ej sb'a eb' vinh rey, ix cot nhililoc eb' vinh yak' oval t'a chonhab' Sion tik.
Palta ayic ix yilan jun chonhab' tik eb' vinh, ix sat sk'ool eb' vinh. Ix somchajel sk'ool eb' vinh, ix b'at eb' vinh elelal.
Ix yamchaj eb' vinh yuj xivelal, tz'ib'xi eb' vinh yuj yaelal, icha junok ix ix van yalji yune'.
Icha tz'aj spojb'at te' barco yic chonhab' Tarsis yuj oval ik' scot t'a b'aj sjavi k'u, icha chi' ix aj satel eb' vinh yuj Dios.
Ha t'a schonhab' Jehová co Diosal Yajal t'a Smasanil, ix quil val yelk'och icha val alb'ilcan t'ayonh. Ha Dios ol yak'nhej stek'anil Jerusalén.
Ach co Diosal, ayic ayonhek' t'a a templo, sco nacot a niwan wach'k'olal.
Ach co Diosal, te b'inajnac ach t'a smasanil yol yib'anhk’inal tik, yuj chi' tz'alchaj wach' lolonel t'ayach. Tza b'o yaj masanil tas t'a stojolal yet' a poder.
Ay stzalajk'olal eb' aj Sion. Te tzalajocab' eb' aj Judá yujto t'a stojolal ix a b'o yaj smasanil.
Ek'anhec oyoyoc t'a spatic yichanh Sion, tze b'isani jaye' storreal.
Scham val e sayan eyil smuroal. Schampax eyilan spat eb' yajal, yic wach' ol yal eyalanel yab'ixal t'a eb' unin manto aljoclaj.
Ha sDiosal Sion, aton co Diosal t'a junelnhej. Ha tzonh ik'annhej b'eyoc masanto t'a slajvub'.
